alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Montgomery; Parke; Tippecanoe; Vermillion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fountain, southern Tippecanoe, northwestern Parke, central Vermillion and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Lafayette to 6 miles northwest of Newport. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of Fountain, southern Tippecanoe, northwestern Parke, central Vermillion and northwestern Montgomery Counties, including the following locations... New Richmond, Mellott, Lodi, Wingate, Cayuga, Newtown, Wallace, Hillsboro, Turkey Run State Park and Yeddo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 near mile marker 163. Interstate 74 between mile markers 13 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for west central Indiana.
